title: GOI十月2023
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:halloween]]
[!-- 图片来源：https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/dingxiaoshu-file --]
[[=]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
//你知道什么是比一个将怪物藏在暗处的全能秘密组织更为可怕的吗？遮蔽住我们用以认识这个世界真正恐怖的视野，控制住我们所知的一切的那个？//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
//是什么？//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
//它们并不孤单。//
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

//昔日的艺术家们，欢迎来到//
@@ @@
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/dingxiaoshu-file/GOI%E5%8D%81%E6%9C%88%E5%A4%B4%E5%9B%BE]]
@@ @@
[[size 95%]]//一个公开的**非官方**SCP艺术挑战，由社区内的各种成员设计和举办！//[[/size]]
[[/=]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
简单的点子：在十月的每一天，这次艺术之疯狂的管理者将给出一个特定标签以提供艺术创作和文章阅读的方向——回想一下SCiP九月吧，不幸的是这个点子今年并没有全面展开，但也因此激发了GOI十月这个点子。

不过当然，事情绝对不会这样简单。我们这次可不提供常规的标签；每一天我们都会提供一个不同的GOI，POI或GOI相关角色的标签供你选择——基金会已经够风光了，是时候让他者闪耀了。

当你根据这个标签读到了一篇不错的文章时，请随意留下评论，讲讲你多么喜欢它！如果你制作了艺术作品并且发布在了网站外，请自由使用如下的格式，在对应的tab下链接你的作品[[footnote]]**译注：**请移步至英文站发布与添加。[[/footnote]]：[[footnote]]**译注：**使用下方格式的作品链接可能需要挂梯观看。 [[/footnote]]

[[code]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[你的链接 文章名称] by [[*user 你的用户名称]]（维基外艺作）

//{{背景简介！（可选）}}//
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[/code]]

如果你是直接发布在维基上的，请选用这个稍微有区别的代码：

[[code]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[[[/文章URL|你艺作或写作页面的标题！]]] by [[*user 你的用户名称]]（写作/艺作）

//{{背景简介！（可选）}}//
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[/code]]

主题没有限制——尽管这//是//一个恐怖月——所以请尽情疯狂吧。无论是庞大还是渺小，是主要还是次要，有500篇文章还是仅仅只有5篇，这就是GOI十月2023所有的标签了。祝你好运。

**使用[[[/tag-search|标签搜索]]]来查找文章！**
[[=]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/dingxiaoshu-file/GOI%E5%8D%81%E6%9C%88%E6%A0%87%E7%AD%BE%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8]]
[[/=]]

接着来看看已有的作品吧。
@@ @@
= [[size 150%]]**{{第一幕：秋日有欢欣……}}**[[/size]]
@@ @@

[[tab 第二天：ruiz-duchamp]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[[[/art:dinodraws-goitober2023|GOITOBER Day 2 - Ruiz Duchamp]]] by [[*user Dino--Draws]]（艺作）

//{{Eyyyyy it's this guy. I have no idea what he looks like so I improvised a scruffed looking bitch. Drew something moderately inspired by Nobody Dies by Randomini because the Cool War is something I read around last year and thinking was fun. My personal art "challenge" to myself was just 'keep it messy!' so I did very minimal cleanup and also just rough painted in the colors. because this man is a MESS.}}//
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[[[//art:spot-s-goitober-2023-submissions | Spot's GOITOBER2023 Submissions, Day 2: Ruiz Duchamp]]] by [[*user spotkitty]]（艺作）

I'm technically a day behind right now but shhhhhh I'll catch up gimme a bit. This ones art challenge thing was "draw in not your usual program" you I used Aggie as opposed to my usual Photoshop.}}//

[[[/art:dinodraws-goitober2023|GOITOBER Day 9 - Eric]]] by [[*user Dino--Draws]]（艺作）

[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[https://x.com/rhineriver_/status/1712115002319024375?s=46&t=tIs71azLEz3unxdmlox6_Q SCP-5102 - Dear Diary] by [[*user Rhineriver]]（维基外艺作）

[https://x.com/anemiaxdd/status/1713682532481253466?s=20 what you wanna be when grow up] by [[*user melendezt]]（维基外艺作）

[[/div]]


[[/tab]]

[[tab 第十天：pangloss]]

[[=]]
[[[//flores-goitober-submissions-2023 | Flores关于GOI十月2023的作品，第十天]]] by [[*user MasonFlores]]（艺作）

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[[[/art:dinodraws-goitober2023|GOITOBER Day 10 - Pangloss]]] by [[*user Dino--Draws]]（艺作）

//{{And then I went all out in an aggie! First time inking something in full and it was actually kinda nice. Anyways- this is King Ragna from the PHENOMINAL SCP-7629 by WarriorofChaos! It is so so fucking cool with its worldbuilding and the DRAGONS HAVE AN ALPHABET! THERE'S AN IMAGE FOR IT TOO IT'S COOL AS FUCK. Please please please go read it it's so fun. It was fun to interpret the design of the Drogonian King himself, what a pretty lookin' dergen :>}}//
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[https://x.com/rhineriver_/status/1712270386308567151?s=46&t=tIs71azLEz3unxdmlox6_Q SCP-1685 - View Points] by [[*user Rhineriver]]（维基外艺作）

[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[/tab]]

[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[https://x.com/rhineriver_/status/1713019109145727168?s=46&t=tIs71azLEz3unxdmlox6_Q SCP-5460 - Often Go Awry] by [[*user Rhineriver]]（维基外艺作）

[[tab 第十二天：大术士亚恩]]

[[=]]
[[[//flores-goitober-submissions-2023 | Flores关于GOI十月2023的作品，第十二天]]] by [[*user MasonFlores]]（艺作）

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[https://x.com/rhineriver_/status/1713256891164262570?s=46&t=tIs71azLEz3unxdmlox6_Q SCP-5480 - Saarn just wants to live a quiet life] by [[*user Rhineriver]]（维基外艺作）

//{{I know very little about Sarkic lore so this article is now canon to my personal headcanon of Sarkicism }}//
[[/=]]

[[=]]

[https://x.com/anemiaxdd/status/1714038589254709724?s=20 to craft a monster] by [[*user melendezt]]（维基外艺作）



//{{another 682 origin story}}//

[[/=]]

[[/div]]

 
[[/tab]]

[[tab 第十三天：观谬维基]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[[[/art:diogene-s-goitober-2023-submissions|The Furmen]]] by [[*user diogene_s]]（艺作）

//{{A wonderful and creepy glimpse of the yeren by a Parawatch user}}//
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[[[//flores-goitober-submissions-2023 | Flores关于GOI十月2023的作品，第十三天]]] by [[*user MasonFlores]]（艺作）

//{{真是个令人不寒而栗的故事！我喜欢再读一遍^^}}//
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[=]]

[[[/art:dinodraws-goitober2023|GOITOBER Day 13 - Parawatch]]] by [[*user Dino--Draws]]（艺作）



//{{CRAWLS OUT OF THE DEPTHS OF HELL. HI IM NOT DEAD I WAS VERY BUSY.}}//

//{{This was a quick doodle based on a scene from Heart of the Beast by aismallard! That tale and the lil mini series its from is so so fun.}}//

[[/=]]

[[/div]]



[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[=]]
